biotools.summary: CSM (Cutoff Scanning Matrix) is a novel structure-based protein function prediction and structural classification method. CSM generates feature vectors that represent distance patterns between protein residues. These feature vectors are then used as evidence for classification.

bioschemas.name: CSM
bioschemas.summary: CSM (Cutoff Scanning Matrix) is a novel structure-based protein function prediction and structural classification method. CSM generates feature vectors that represent distance patterns between protein residues. These feature vectors are then used as evidence for classification.
